A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a life long fan of StarWars and someone who read the Heir to the Empire series as well as other \"legends\" books in my youth\, I have tried to stay with this new starwars cannon. I like Rey. I like Kylo. However\, I don't like what Disney has done with the heroic Luke Skywalker. I was looking forward to the payoffs of what was setup in the force awakens. Now the introduction of Snoke and the death of Han Solo feels cheap and all the speculation and excitement about who Rey truly is was for nothing. Way to go Disney.
